description: The German government considers creating an offshore launchpad for satellites.
title: Germany eyes space satellite launchpad in North Sea
title_page: Germany eyes space satellite launchpad in North Sea - BBC News
maintext: They could, and do, go up as flocks - 30-60 at a time - on big rockets. But that often means having to wait on others' readiness, and going to orbits that are a compromise for everyone involved, rather than the ideal orbit for your particular mission.
